title: Application opening placeholder page shows two timezones
body_html:
The current placeholder page for /apply shows the date and time on which applications will open. The system is smart enough to translate that into the user's set timezone (which can be set in the user profile by the user), but we've hardcoded “UTC” into the sentence, which leads to showing two timezones instead of just one. Example:

message with my original timezone (timezone set to Europe/Vienna)

message with a random timezone I set (America/Argentina/Buenos_Aires)

The best fix scenario would be to show the opening time in the user's timezone as a default, and fallback on the time value in UTC if no user timezone has been set. (I am not sure if every new user has a timezone default that we could use for that).
